data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Karabük a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karabük, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Karabük.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 40 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Karabük, Turkey.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, sanctify the 86 believers in Karabük and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Karabük, Turkey.
Father, I pray that the Arab, Lebanese people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Arab, Lebanese people know you.
the state of Karabük has (about) 86 people who know Jesus, 1,289 people who know about him culturally, and 228,924 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, train the church of Karabük, Turkey to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Karabük, Turkey to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 230,213 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

location.name: Karabük
